response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you today. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, taking into account the product's worth to you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a fantastic deal. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll proceed with the transaction immediately.", "product_price": 75}
